story.title: From a Home Kitchen to a Premium Cloud Kitchen
content: At Pristine Salads, we believe healthy eating should be a delightful experience. What began as a small idea has grown into a premium cloud kitchen dedicated to wellness.
We provide nutrition-full and healthy foods, ensuring every meal is a perfect balance of taste and vitality. Our mission is to nourish your body with wholesome ingredients.

chefHighlights.name: Crispy Falafel with Hummus
chefHighlights.description: Vegan diet with plant based protein.

chefHighlights.name: Saute Veggies dressing with yoghurt tahini sauce
chefHighlights.description: Fresh buttery avocado, kale, spinach, toasted seeds, and balsamic vinaigrette.

items.name: Bean Sprouts (Special Salad)

items.description: Rice base + sautéed paneer tossed in mix herbs.

items.description: Super food base + mix herb sautéed paneer. High protein • Rich flavour.

offer.title: FLAT 20% OFF
offer.description: On your first order! Use code: FRESH20

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.text: The freshest salads I've ever had! The Sprout Bean mix is my daily go-to for post-workout nutrition.

testimonials.name: Rahul Verma
testimonials.text: Love the variety. The packaging is eco-friendly and the delivery is always on time. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Anjali Deshmukh
testimonials.text: Finally a place that understands 'healthy' doesn't mean boring. The dressings are absolutely delicious.
